name: Cherish Ball
description: A quite rare PokÃ© Ball that has been crafted in order to commemorate a special occasion of some sort.

name: Premier Ball
description: A somewhat rare PokÃ© Ball that was made as a commemorative item used to celebrate an event of some sort.

name: Amaze Mulch
description: A fertilizer for growing Berries. However, it appears to be unsuitable for the soil in the Hoenn region and has no effect.

name: Black Flute
description: A flute made from black glass. It makes it easier to encounter strong PokÃ©mon in the place you use it.

name: Blue Flute
description: A flute made from blue glass that awakens sleeping PokÃ©mon.

name: Boost Mulch
description: A fertilizer for growing Berries. However, it appears to be unsuitable for the soil in the Hoenn region and has no effect.

name: Common Stone
description: A perfectly normal stone that might appear to be valuable to some. It's all in the eye of the beholder.

name: Damp Mulch
description: A fertilizer for growing Berries. However, it appears to be unsuitable for the soil in the Hoenn region and has no effect.

name: Fluffy Tail
description: A toy that attracts the attention of a PokÃ©mon. It guarantees escape from any battle with wild PokÃ©mon.

name: Gooey Mulch
description: A fertilizer for growing Berries. However, it appears to be unsuitable for the soil in the Hoenn region and has no effect.

name: Growth Mulch
description: A fertilizer for growing Berries. However, it appears to be unsuitable for the soil in the Hoenn region and has no effect.

name: Odd Keystone
description: A vital item that is needed to keep a stone tower from collapsing. Voices can be heard from it occasionally.

name: Red Flute
description: A flute made from red glass that snaps PokÃ©mon out of infatuation.

name: Rich Mulch
description: A fertilizer for growing Berries. However, it appears to be unsuitable for the soil in the Hoenn region and has no effect.

name: Shoal Salt
description: Salt that you found inside Shoal Cave.

name: Shoal Shell
description: A seashell that you found inside Shoal Cave.

name: Stable Mulch
description: A fertilizer for growing Berries. However, it appears to be unsuitable for the soil in the Hoenn region and has no effect.

name: Surprise Mulch
description: A fertilizer for growing Berries. However, it appears to be unsuitable for the soil in the Hoenn region and has no effect.

name: White Flute
description: A flute made from white glass. It makes it easier to encounter weak PokÃ©mon in the place you use it.

name: Yellow Flute
description: A flute made from yellow glass that snaps PokÃ©mon out of confusion.

name: Claw Fossil
description: A fossil from a prehistoric PokÃ©mon that once lived in the sea. It appears to be a fragment of a claw.

name: Dome Fossil
description: A fossil from a prehistoric PokÃ©mon that once lived in the sea. It could be a shell or carapace.

name: Helix Fossil
description: A fossil from a prehistoric PokÃ©mon that once lived in the sea. It might be a piece of a seashell.

name: Jaw Fossil
description: A fossil from a prehistoric PokÃ©mon that once lived on the land. It looks as if it could be a piece of a large jaw.

name: Old Amber
description: A piece of amber that still contains the genetic material of an ancient PokÃ©mon. It's clear with a tawny, reddish tint.

name: Root Fossil
description: A fossil from a prehistoric PokÃ©mon that once lived in the sea. It looks as if it could be part of a plant's root.

name: Sail Fossil
description: A fossil from a prehistoric PokÃ©mon that once lived on the land. It looks like the impression from a skin sail.

name: Belue Berry
description: Used to make PokÃ©blocks that will enhance your Beauty, this Berry is rare in other regions.

name: Cornn Berry
description: Used to make PokÃ©blocks that will enhance your Beauty, this Berry is rare in other regions.

name: Custap Berry
description: A Berry to be consumed by PokÃ©mon. If a PokÃ©mon holds one, it will be able to move first just once when it's in a pinch.

name: Durin Berry
description: Used to make PokÃ©blocks that will enhance your Cleverness, this Berry is rare in other regions.

name: Enigma Berry
description: A Berry to be consumed by PokÃ©mon. If a PokÃ©mon holds one, being hit by a supereffective attack will restore its HP.

name: Jaboca Berry
description: A Berry to be consumed by PokÃ©mon. If a physical attack hits the PokÃ©mon holding it, the attacker will also be hurt.

name: Magost Berry
description: Used to make PokÃ©blocks that will enhance your Cuteness, this Berry is rare in other regions.

name: Micle Berry
description: A Berry to be consumed by PokÃ©mon. If a PokÃ©mon holds one, its accuracy will increase just once when it's in a pinch.

name: Nanab Berry
description: Used to make PokÃ©blocks that will enhance your Cuteness. Its pink flesh is sweet when eaten.

name: Nomel Berry
description: Used to make PokÃ©blocks that will enhance your Toughness, this Berry is rare in other regions.

name: Pamtre Berry
description: Used to make PokÃ©blocks that will enhance your Beauty, this Berry is rare in other regions.

name: Rabuta Berry
description: Used to make PokÃ©blocks that will enhance your Cleverness, this Berry is rare in other regions.

name: Razz Berry
description: Used to make PokÃ©blocks that will enhance your Coolness. Its red flesh is spicy when eaten.

name: Rowap Berry
description: A Berry to be consumed by PokÃ©mon. If a special attack hits the PokÃ©mon holding it, the attacker will also be hurt.

name: Spelon Berry
description: Used to make PokÃ©blocks that will enhance your Cuteness, this Berry is rare in other regions.

name: Watmel Berry
description: Used to make PokÃ©blocks that will enhance your Cleverness, this Berry is rare in other regions.

name: Wepear Berry
description: Used to make PokÃ©blocks that will enhance your Cleverness. Its green flesh is bitter when eaten.

name: Blue Scarf
description: An item to be held by a PokÃ©mon. During a contest, it raises the Beauty aspect of the PokÃ©mon holding it.

name: Bug Gem
description: A gem with an insect-like essence. When held, it strengthens the power of a Bug-type move one time.

name: Dark Gem
description: A gem with an essence of darkness. When held, it strengthens the power of a Dark-type move one time.

name: Macho Brace
description: An item to be held by a PokÃ©mon. This stiff, heavy brace helps PokÃ©mon grow strong but cuts Speed in battle.

name: Marshadium Z
description: It converts Z-Power into crystals that upgrade Marshadow's Spectral Thief to an exclusive Z-Move.

name: Mewnium Z
description: It converts Z-Power into crystals that upgrade Mew's Psychic to an exclusive Z-Move.

name: Pikashunium Z
description: This is a crystallized form of Z-Power. It upgrades a Thunderbolt by Pikachu in a cap to a Z-Move.

name: Snorlium Z
description: It converts Z-Power into crystals that upgrade Snorlax's Giga Impact to an exclusive Z-Move.
